entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:26AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot And Dry Over Eastern Interior This Weekend... Hot, dry and smokey conditions will occur over the Eastern Interior this weekend. High temperatures be between 80 and 90.
